welcome.title: Welcome to Tribos
welcome.subtitle: Your AI-powered training companion for cyclists
welcome.description: Tribos helps you train smarter by combining route planning, workout scheduling, and AI coaching into one seamless experience. Whether you're preparing for your first century or your next race, we've got the tools to help you get there.

features.title: Plan Your Training vs Training Analysis

items.name: Plan Your Training
items.description: Your interactive training calendar. Drag and drop workouts onto your schedule, build out your training weeks, and see your planned Training Stress Score (TSS) alongside completed activities. Think of it as your whiteboard for mapping out what's ahead.

items.name: Training Analysis
items.description: Dive deep into completed rides. View your route on the map, analyze power and heart rate metrics, see intensity breakdowns, and understand how each ride contributes to your fitness. This is where you review what you've done.

features.summary: Plan looks forward. Analysis looks back. Use both to train with intention.

features.title: Meet Your AI Coaches
features.description: Three distinct AI personalities, each designed for a specific part of your training journey.

items.name: Training Coach
items.description: Need workout ideas? The Training Coach suggests specific sessions based on your goals and recent activity. Get recommendations you can add to your calendar with one click.

items.name: Accountability Coach
items.description: Life gets busy. The Accountability Coach keeps you honest—tracking your weekly compliance, remembering your goals, and giving you the nudge (or reality check) you need to stay consistent.

items.name: Training Strategist
items.description: Thinking bigger picture? The Strategist helps with periodization, race prep, and long-term planning. Have strategic conversations about building toward your goals.
items.highlight: Plan your season, not just your week

updates.title: Route Builder - Manual Mode
updates.description: Take full control of your routes. Click to place waypoints, drag to adjust, and build exactly the ride you want with real-time elevation and surface info.
details: Draggable waypoints with snap-to-roads or freehand drawing
Gradient-colored route line showing slope and surface type overlay
Elevation profile with click-drag selection and section metrics

updates.title: AI-Assisted Route Editing
updates.description: Edit your routes with natural language. Tell the AI what you want — add a hill, avoid a road, extend the loop — and watch it adjust your route in real time.
details: Natural language commands to reshape your route
Smart POIs along your route — water, food, bike shops, viewpoints
Compare 2-3 segment alternatives between any two waypoints

updates.title: Training Plans on Your Calendar
updates.description: Your AI coach can now build structured training plans and place them directly onto your calendar. Plans adapt to your schedule and the coach remembers your history across sessions.
details: AI-generated plans dropped straight onto your training calendar
Coach memory across sessions for smarter recommendations
Schedule-aware planning that respects your availability

updates.title: AI Coach Experience Redesign
updates.description: A faster, more integrated coaching experience. Access your coach from a spotlight-style command bar and get proactive suggestions right on your dashboard.
details: Spotlight-style command bar for quick coach access
Inline CoachCard with proactive training suggestions
Unified workout recommendations across all surfaces

updates.title: Garmin Sync Reliability
updates.description: Major reliability overhaul for Garmin data syncing. Your rides now process more consistently, and you'll get a heads-up if your connection ever needs attention.
details: Fixed webhook processing for more reliable activity imports
Proactive alerts when your Garmin connection needs attention
Improved token refresh and rate limiting

updates.title: Ride Data Accuracy Fixes
updates.description: Cleaned up ride summary calculations so your numbers are accurate. Bad sensor values are now filtered out and Work (kJ) is calculated correctly.
details: FIT file sentinel values filtered from summaries
Corrected Work (kJ) calculation
Force-reprocess mode for fixing historical rides

updates.title: The Cafe - Community & Accountability
updates.description: Find your people. Join small groups of 5-10 cyclists with similar goals for weekly check-ins, discussions, and accountability. Like meeting up at your favorite cafe stop, but online.
details: Weekly check-ins to share reflections, not ride spam
Discussion threads for training questions and advice
Goal-matched groups so you train with like-minded riders

updates.title: Smarter Route Generation
updates.description: Routes now build segment-by-segment along real roads, giving you more natural loops that hit your target distance accurately. No more weird detours or off-road surprises.
details: Routes follow actual road networks
More accurate distance targeting
Better loop shapes that make sense
